title: VSB_1st_place_solution
description: This notebook contains the winning solution to the VSB Power Line Fault Detection competition. Key Information: * Simple LightGBM model * Standard 5-fold CV * Uses just 9 features * Features all calculated using the peaks in the signals * Run times:     * Generating features: ~15 minutes     * Training: ~2 minutes     * Prediction: ~10 seconds
description_lemmatized: notebook contains winning solution vsb power line fault detection competition key information simple lightgbm model standard 5fold cv us 9 feature feature calculated using peak signal run time generating feature 15 minute training 2 minute prediction 10 second
